welcome_message_body: Welcome to New Brighton, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and lively atmosphere. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal flights to popular holiday destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warton Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
